snippet: Andy Murray and 14 times grand slam winner Rafael Nadal will meet in the last four of the Madrid Open on Saturday in a repeat of last year's final won by the Scot....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray and 14 times grand slam winner Rafael Nadal will meet in the last four of the Madrid Open on Saturday in a repeat of last year's final won by the Scot.

headline.print_headline: Murray to Play Nadal in Madrid Semi-Finals
headline.main: Murray to Play Nadal in Madrid Semi-Finals
